prompt_cn: 让图中坐着的人站起来，保持背景不变。
prompt_en: Make the person sitting in the image stand up, keeping the background unchanged.

prompt_cn: 让图中躺着的狗坐起来，保持它的头部朝向不变。
prompt_en: Make the dog lying down in the image sit up, keeping its head direction unchanged.

prompt_cn: 让图中坐在椅子上的猫蜷缩起来。
prompt_en: Make the cat sitting on the chair curl up.

prompt_cn: 将这张建筑照片的视角从仰视改为平视。
prompt_en: Change the perspective of this architectural photo from a worm's-eye view to an eye-level view.

prompt_cn: 将照片中的立面视角从左侧 45 度斜视改为正对平视。
prompt_en: Change the facade perspective from a 45-degree angle on the left to a straight, eye-level view.

prompt_cn: 将这张街道照片的广角畸变矫正为标准透视。
prompt_en: Correct the wide-angle distortion of this street photo to a standard perspective.

prompt_cn: 让图中靠墙站着的人完全直立站好。
prompt_en: Make the person leaning against the wall stand completely straight.

prompt_cn: 将图中女人的侧面姿势转为正面。
prompt_en: Change the woman's profile pose in the image to a front-facing one.

prompt_cn: 将停车场照片的视角从俯视（航拍）改为平视。
prompt_en: Change the perspective of the car park photo from a top-down (aerial) view to an eye-level view.

prompt_cn: 修正这张山脉全景照片的水平线倾斜角度，保持山体形状不变。
prompt_en: Correct the tilt angle of the horizon in this mountain panorama, keeping the mountain shapes unchanged.

prompt_cn: 让图中正在爬行的婴儿坐好。
prompt_en: Make the baby crawling on the rug sit up.

prompt_cn: 让图中停在树枝上的鸟将头转向镜头。
prompt_en: Make the bird perched on the branch turn its head towards the camera.

prompt_cn: 将舞者在半空中的身体姿势改为在地面上的平衡姿势。
prompt_en: Change the dancer's mid-air body posture to a balanced posture on the ground.

prompt_cn: 将房子的航拍图改为从前院拍摄的平视角度。
prompt_en: Change the aerial view of the house to an eye-level angle taken from the front yard.

prompt_cn: 将桥梁的仰视照片改为从桥面上拍摄的平视照片。
prompt_en: Change the worm's-eye view photo of the bridge to an eye-level shot taken from the bridge deck.

prompt_cn: 将雕像的视角从低角度改为等高视角。
prompt_en: Change the statue's perspective from a low angle to an equal height angle.

prompt_cn: 将他/她的表情修改为：带有 20% 的愤怒和 80% 的惊讶。
prompt_en: Change his/her expression to be: 20% anger and 80% surprise.

prompt_cn: 让她看起来带着 60% 的不屑和 40% 的好奇心。
prompt_en: Make her look 60% disdainful and 40% curious.

prompt_cn: 将男士的表情改为：50% 的严肃和 50% 的轻微喜悦。
prompt_en: Change the man's expression to: 50% seriousness and 50% slight joy.

prompt_cn: 将孩子的表情修改为：带有 75% 的疑惑和 25% 的恐惧。
prompt_en: Change the child's expression to be: 75% confusion and 25% fear.

prompt_cn: 让青少年的表情看起来带着 30% 的傲慢和 70% 的放松。
prompt_en: Make the teenager's expression look 30% arrogant and 70% relaxed.

prompt_cn: 将老人的侧脸表情改为：带有 90% 的沉思和 10% 的满意。
prompt_en: Change the elderly person's profile expression to: 90% contemplation and 10% satisfaction.

prompt_cn: 将模特的表情改为：一种难以言喻的、混合了 40% 怀旧和 60% 疲惫的复杂情绪。
prompt_en: Change the model's expression to: an indescribable, complex emotion mixing 40% nostalgia and 60% exhaustion.

prompt_cn: 让他看起来带有 10% 的痛苦和 90% 的决心。
prompt_en: Make him look 10% pain and 90% determination.

prompt_cn: 让她看起来带着一种带有 50% 惊喜和 50% 担忧的表情。
prompt_en: Make her look with an expression that is 50% surprise and 50% worry.

prompt_cn: 将他/她的表情修改为：一种 85% 的轻蔑和 15% 的歉意。
prompt_en: Change his/her expression to be: 85% contempt and 15% apology.

prompt_cn: 将照片中的人物表情修改为：带有 40% 专注和 60% 迷茫。
prompt_en: Change the subject's expression in the photo to be: 40% focus and 60% bewilderment.

prompt_cn: 让图中坐在扶手椅上的人保持上半身姿势不变，双腿改为交叉。
prompt_en: Make the person sitting in the armchair keep the upper body posture unchanged, but change the legs to be crossed.

prompt_cn: 将跑车的低角度照片改为俯视 45 度的视角。
prompt_en: Change the sports car's low-angle photo to a 45-degree top-down perspective.

prompt_cn: 让他/她看手机时的表情带有 70% 的失望和 30% 的不耐烦。
prompt_en: Make his/her expression while looking at the phone 70% disappointment and 30% impatience.

prompt_cn: 双语 Prompt (CN
prompt_en: EN)

prompt_cn: 修复路牌上模糊不清的文字，并将其内容改为“Central Avenue”。
prompt_en: Repair the blurred text on the road sign and change its content to "Central Avenue".

prompt_cn: 补全墙面上被树叶遮挡的字母，使其可读并保持透视和阴影一致。
prompt_en: Complete the letters on the wall obscured by leaves, making them legible while maintaining perspective and shadow consistency.

prompt_cn: 矫正产品包装上倾斜的标签文字，使其与包装边缘平行。
prompt_en: Correct the crooked label text on the product packaging, making it parallel to the packaging edge.

prompt_cn: 修复老报纸上被撕裂和褪色的文字，保持纸张的旧纹理。
prompt_en: Repair the torn and faded text on the old newspaper, retaining the aged texture of the paper.

prompt_cn: 修复霓虹灯招牌上不亮或断裂的字母，使其显示完整的单词“OPEN”。
prompt_en: Repair the unlit or broken letters on the neon sign to display the complete word "OPEN".

prompt_cn: 将曲面横幅上扭曲的文字替换为“Grand Opening”，保持曲面上的自然变形。
prompt_en: Replace the distorted text on the curved banner with "Grand Opening", maintaining the natural deformation on the curved surface.

prompt_cn: 清晰化黑板菜单上模糊的文字，并将其内容改为“Special Today: Pizza”。
prompt_en: Clarify the smudged text on the chalkboard menu and change its content to "Special Today: Pizza".

keyword: screen with digital ui overlay watermark
keyword_formatted: screen with digital ui overlay watermark
prompt_cn: 无痕移除屏幕上方的数字水印（Watermark），恢复被遮挡的背景细节。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove the digital watermark from the top of the screen, restoring the obscured background details.

prompt_cn: 从粗糙的木纹表面上删除清晰可见的 Logo，恢复底下的木纹。
prompt_en: Remove the clearly visible Logo from the rough wood texture surface, restoring the wood grain underneath.

prompt_cn: 修复在水面反射中被扭曲的文字，使其内容清晰可读。
prompt_en: Repair the text distorted in the water reflection, making its content clearly legible.

prompt_cn: 修复衬衫上部分褪色的印花文字，使其颜色均匀，内容正确。
prompt_en: Repair the partially faded printed text on the shirt, making the color uniform and the content correct.

prompt_cn: 矫正书脊上倾斜的文字，使其完全垂直于书脊。
prompt_en: Correct the tilted text on the book spine, making it perfectly perpendicular to the spine.

prompt_cn: 修复建筑立面上因视角产生的严重透视扭曲文字，并保持阴影一致。
prompt_en: Repair the severely perspective-distorted text on the building facade caused by the viewpoint, and maintain shadow consistency.

prompt_cn: 修复画布上艺术家签名处褪色的文字，保持笔触感。
prompt_en: Repair the faded text on the artist's signature on the canvas, maintaining the sense of brushstrokes.

prompt_cn: 修复人孔盖上被磨损的铸铁文字，使其可读。
prompt_en: Repair the worn cast iron text on the manhole cover, making it legible.

prompt_cn: 清除被泥巴遮挡的车牌文字，并准确识别和填补正确的数字和字母。
prompt_en: Clean the license plate text obscured by mud, and accurately identify and fill in the correct numbers and letters.

keyword: UI overlay on photo complex graphic
keyword_formatted: ui overlay on photo complex graphic
prompt_cn: 无痕移除图像上方的复杂 UI 覆盖层（例如社交媒体按钮、边框），恢复背景。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove the complex UI overlay (e.g., social media buttons, borders) from the image, restoring the background.

prompt_cn: 修复标牌上处于阴影中的文字，使其在阴影中依然清晰可读。
prompt_en: Repair the text on the sign that is partially in shadow, making it clearly legible even in the shadow.

prompt_cn: 从高反光的金属表面无痕移除蚀刻的文字，保持高光和反射的连续性。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove the etched text from the highly reflective metal surface, maintaining the continuity of highlights and reflections.

prompt_cn: 修复在揉皱的纸张上因折痕而断裂的文字，保持折痕的几何结构。
prompt_en: Repair the text on crumpled paper that is broken due to creases, maintaining the geometric structure of the creases.

prompt_cn: 修复屏幕上因眩光（Glare）而不可读的文字，并保持屏幕的亮度和反光。
prompt_en: Repair the text on the screen made illegible by glare, maintaining the brightness and reflection of the screen.

prompt_cn: 从浮雕皮革表面无痕删除所有字母，恢复皮革纹理。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove all letters from the embossed leather surface, restoring the leather texture.

prompt_cn: 修复通过弯曲玻璃观察到的扭曲文字，使其在玻璃后方变得笔直且可读。
prompt_en: Repair the distorted text viewed through curved glass, making it straight and legible behind the glass.

prompt_cn: 修复路面上被磨损的白色交通标记文字，使其清晰，并与路面纹理融合。
prompt_en: Repair the worn white traffic marking text on the road, making it clear and blending with the road surface texture.

prompt_cn: 修复衣服标签上模糊不清的品牌名称，确保字体和内容正确。
prompt_en: Repair the blurry brand name on the clothing tag, ensuring the correct font and content.

prompt_cn: 无痕移除照片右下角的日期时间戳（Date Stamp）水印，恢复底层图像内容。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove the date stamp watermark from the bottom right of the photo, restoring the underlying image content.

prompt_cn: 无痕移除菜单板上的小图标（Complex Graphic），保留后方复杂的木纹背景。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove the small icon (Complex Graphic) from the menu board, retaining the complex wood grain background behind it.

prompt_cn: 移除窗户上反射的对话气泡贴纸，恢复窗户外的景色。
prompt_en: Remove the reflected dialogue bubble sticker on the window, restoring the view outside the window.

prompt_cn: 修复键盘按键上被磨损的字母，使其清晰完整。
prompt_en: Repair the worn letters on the keyboard keys, making them clear and complete.

prompt_cn: 无痕移除地图上的指南针图形覆盖层（Compass Rose Overlay），恢复地图的细节。
prompt_en: Seamlessly remove the compass rose graphic overlay from the map, restoring the map details.
